code: import axios from'axios';import{API}from'../utils/config';export var register=function register(user){return axios.post("".concat(API,"/user/signup"),user,{headers:{'Content-Type':'application/json'}});};export var login=function login(user){console.log("here");console.log("".concat(API,"/user/signin"));return axios.post("".concat(API,"/user/signin"),user,{headers:{'Content-Type':'application/json'}});};
